short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enjoy your favorite webnovels from the source with smooth, accurate translations created by AI and refined by human expertise.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
✦ Cutting-Edge AI + Human Expertise
Experience smooth, highly accurate translations powered by state-of-the-art Generative AI and refined by human expertise. Say goodbye to long waits for traditional webnovel translations.

✦ Original Illustrations and Translator's Notes
Enjoy more than just a translation – original illustrations and insightful translator's notes enrich your reading experience.

✦ Support Your Favorite Authors
Support your favorite authors by reading their works directly from the publishing source.

✦ Expanding Library
Explore our Contemporary Collection at SmoothReads.World, featuring a rapidly growing list of supported works. Additional languages beyond English are coming soon!

✦ Desktop and Mobile
Smooth Reader is compatible with Chrome on desktop, as well as Kiwi Browser on Android and Kagi’s Orion Browser (up to version 1.3.8) on iOS.
